```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
input <- read_csv(file = "day11.txt", col_names = c("seat"))
t <- input %>%
  separate_rows(seat, sep = "", convert = TRUE) %>%
  drop_na()
seats <- matrix(data = t$seat, nrow = nrow(input), byrow = TRUE)
seats
```
